tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE attendance_data (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(255),
  event_date DATE,
  attendance_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE virtual_lectures (
    lecture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lecture_name VARCHAR,
    lecturer_name VARCHAR,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE attendance_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lecture_id INT,
    student_id INT,
    attendance_status BOOLEAN,
    participation_points INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (lecture_id) REFERENCES virtual_lectures(lecture_id)
);

CREATE TABLE LectureAttendees (
  lecture_id INT NOT NULL,
  student_id INT NOT NULL,
  attendance_status BOOLEAN,
  participation_score INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (lecture_id, student_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WebinarAttendees (
  webinar_id INT NOT NULL,
  attendee_id INT NOT NULL,
  join_time TIMESTAMP,
  leave_time TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (webinar_id, attendee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Lectures (
    lecture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lecture_title VARCHAR(255),
    lecture_date DATE,
    presenter_name VARCHAR(255),
    participants_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE Webinars (
    webinar_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    webinar_topic VARCHAR(255),
    webinar_date DATE,
    presenter_name VARCHAR(255),
    attendees_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE Attendance (
    attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    participant_id INT,
    attendance_status VARCHAR(50),
    check_in_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES Lectures(lecture_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES Participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE lecture_feedback (
    feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    lecture_id INT NOT NULL,
    participant_id INT NOT NULL,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE webinar_feedback (
    feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    webinar_id INT NOT NULL,
    participant_id INT NOT NULL,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);
